data.text:
All aboard! üö¢ The #IMDboat is returning to San Diego for another fun-filled year at Comic-Con International from Thursday, July 25 - Saturday, July 27. IMDb coverage will include exclusive portraits and video interviews with top celebrities, an invite-only IMDbPro Industry Happy Hour, and a cast meet-and-greet for MGM+‚Äôs ‚ÄúFROM.‚Äù The IMDboat will be full of onboard fan experiences featuring interactive games and programming with sponsors including DiGiorno, Ravensburger featuring the Disney Lorcana Trading Card Game, Prime Video, and MGM+. The boat will be docked at Fifth Avenue Landing, directly behind the San Diego Convention Center, and open to invited guests and entertainment fans daily from 10 a.m. to 4 p.m. PDT. For more details on how to register for access to #IMDboat, visit https://lnkd.in/dvAz-3sb. Check-in is located on the boardwalk across from the boat in Fifth Avenue Landing. For exclusive IMDb coverage of San Diego Comic-Con 2024, visit imdb.com/comic-con and follow @IMDb and #IMDboat on Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, YouTube, and X. Come see us!

IMDbPro, the essential resource for entertainment professionals, launched our early #PrimeDay deal today! For a limited time, Amazon Prime members can save big with our lowest price of the year on an annual premium membership to IMDbPro. New premium members also receive a complimentary 30-day trial to experience the full suite of tools and features to claim and customize your IMDb and IMDbPro name pages. Whether you're an actor, producer, director, or work in any other entertainment role, now is the perfect time to take your career to the next level. Sign up today at IMDbPro.com (no promo code needed). #IMDb #IMDbPro #EntertainmentProfessionals

IMDb is bringing interactive entertainment experiences to #CannesLions2024 this week. If you're at the festival, be sure to visit #AmazonPort through June 21 to: ‚ú® Experience the latest engaging and interactive programming from IMDb ‚ú® Explore the future of entertainment and innovation ‚ú® Connect with leaders across the entertainment and advertising industries Don't miss this opportunity to immerse yourself in the magic of movies, TV, and creativity at #CannesLions2024. Head to the #AmazonPort to check it out! #IMDb #CannesLions

Celebrating the Global Reach of Indian Cinema: The entertainment industry has never been more interconnected globally, and nowhere is this more evident than in the international fandom for Indian actors. IMDb recently unveiled its list of the Top 100 Most Viewed Indian Stars of the Last Decade, offering fascinating insights into the evolution of #India's entertainment landscape over the past decade. Leading the pack is Deepika Padukone, who burst onto the scene with her debut in the 2007 hit "Om Shanti Om" and has gone on to become one of the biggest names in Indian cinema. She's followed closely by Shah Rukh Khan, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Alia Bhatt, and the late Irrfan Khan - a testament to the depth of talent that the Indian film industry has cultivated. The list spans actors from the Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, Malayalam, and Kannada industries, underlining the global reach of Indian entertainment. Check out the full list of the Top 100 Most Viewed Indian Stars here: https://lnkd.in/g9S7geJj What are your thoughts on the rising profile of international cinema? Let us know your perspective in the comments.

Attention all movie lovers! üé¨ We‚Äôre excited to share a comprehensive list of the biggest and most anticipated film releases coming to theaters and streaming platforms this summer. Curated by our team of editors, this "Big List of Summer Movies" covers a diverse array of exciting new titles, from blockbuster sequels to compelling biopics. Some highlights include: üìΩ Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes (in theaters now) üìΩ IF (in theaters now) üìΩ Hit Man (streaming on Netflix June 7) üìΩ Inside Out 2 (in theaters June 14) üìΩ I Am: Celine Dion (streaming on Prime Video June 25) üìΩ A Quiet Place: Day One (in theaters June 28) üìΩ Fly Me to the Moon (in theaters July 12) üìΩ Twisters (in theaters July 19) üìΩ Deadpool & Wolverine (in theaters July 26) üìΩ It Ends With Us (in theaters August 9) And many more! You can find the full list with release details here: https://lnkd.in/gSyGFGdj We want to hear your thoughts. Which of these upcoming releases are you most looking forward to? What do you think will be the big breakout hits of the summer? Share your insights in the comments and don't forget to add your must-see films to your IMDb Watchlist.
